channel.title: The most frustrating deaths in ToL universe!
channel.description: What is in your opinion the worst or most frustating death that you encountered in your ToL expierence? Starting with: Get executed by Prince when i was confirmed BD and lose a game.

item.title: The most frustrating deaths in ToL universe!
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
You mean to butler right? I mean how Drunk can kill King by himself?

Read full topic

item.title: The most frustrating deaths in ToL universe!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
As alchemist I bomb the Assassin (on purpose. Not a YOLO) and then claimed the kill explisitly stating why I did it.

I then bomb the MM (I just knew he was scum at the time) and am debauched by the drunk and hanged for being a killer.

It was a reaper game and the nature of my first kill ment it could not have been reaper because he had spoken the day before.

Unseen then proceeded to win.

Read full topic
item.source: The most frustrating deaths in ToL universe!

item.title: The most frustrating deaths in ToL universe!

item.description:
Being killed by an Assassin as Psycho King.

Also bleeding to death as Psycho King with 2 Mercenaries on me.
